column5: My wife and I haven't been up to LOTW since 2018. We had been making at least one trip annually since 1985. Illness threw a wrench in our plans. But this year, we're both healthy enough to make the trip.So, Friday, we head north. We are both ecstatic (and very thankful) that we are getting another chance to fish the lake again. If you happen to see a little white Alumacraft Classic scooting around the lake, be sure to wave!
I can sense your excitement from here. Have a great trip!

Sounds like you guys are about to have a great trip. Also sounds like you deserve it! I know for us last year, that first shore lunch seemed to mark an end to the pandemic. I don't know that I have ever tasted better food than that first batch of walleye, fried potatoes, beans, and bread/butter. Have a great time, looking forward to your trip report. Our countdown is 7 days, as of now. Can't wait!
